name.en: Advanced digital signal processing and adaptive noise reduction
name.ch: 高等數位訊號處理與可適性濾波原理

department.ch: 生醫科學與工程學系跨領域轉譯醫學博士班
department.en: PhD in Institute of Translational and Interdisciplinary Medicine

goal.ch: 了解生物系統的主要挑戰之一，在於將微觀層次的改變（例如：分子、細胞、激素、結構等）連結到在有機體整體層次觀察到的動態變化。欲克服在非線性系統微觀與巨觀性質間建立連結本質上的困難，在系統整體層次上的定量描述方法至關重要。本課程即在介紹各種系統性的方法，定量描述系統產生之動態模式。
goal.en: One of the main challenges in understanding biological systems is to link microscopic changes (eg, molecules, cells, hormones, structures, etc.) to dynamic changes observed at the overall level of the organism. To overcome the difficulty of establishing a link between the microscopic and macroscopic properties of a nonlinear system, a quantitative description of the system as a whole is critical. This course introduces a variety of systematic approaches to quantitatively describe the dynamic patterns generated by the system.

outline.ch:
1：時間頻率表示的介紹
2：時間頻率表示的介紹
3：Gabor變換和小波變換
4：階段重新分配
5：階段重新分配
6：Hilbert Huang變換
7：稀疏表示
8：交叉頻率調製
9：交叉頻率調製
10：Granger因果關係
11：Granger因果關係
12：多尺度相關
13：多尺度相關
14：Kolmogrov熵
15：Kolmogrov熵
16：多尺度熵
17：多尺度熵
18：最終測試
outline.en:
1: Introduction to time frequency representation
2: Introduction to time frequency representation
3: Gabor Transform and Wavelet Transform
4: Phase reassignment
5: Phase reassignment
6: Hilbert Huang Transform
7: Sparse representation
8: Cross frequency modulation
9: Cross frequency modulation
10: Granger causality
11: Granger causality
12: Multiscale correlation
13: Multiscale correlation
14: Kolmogrov entropy
15: Kolmogrov entropy
16: Multiscale entropy
17: Multiscale entropy
18:final test

textbook.en:
1) Adaptive Filter Theory/Simon Haykin
2) Time-frequency Analysis/Leon Cohen

gradMethod.ch:
出席12%
報告 48%
期末考 40%

ch.competencies: 轉譯醫學與臨床問題締合
數據分析、邏輯推演與建模預測
智慧財產價值創新、維護與尊重
